notes: This file encodes PROGRAM CRITERIA only (not wizard logic).
Where feasible, criteria are normalized into atomic triplets: {subject, operator, value}.
Some criteria remain as free-text in narrative_criteria when they are hard to atomize cleanly (e.g., 'meet all other requirements').
Operators are intentionally simple so an agent can map them to its own reasoning layer.

operator_guide.meaning: Value is one of allowed options
A required condition that is not a simple comparison

programs.title: Express Entry
programs.summary: Online application system for skilled workers. Includes FSTP, FSWP, CEC.

criteria.subject: applicant.work_experience
criteria.value: qualifying skilled work experience

criteria.subject: applicant.program_requirements
criteria.value: meet all other requirements for the specific Express Entry program

narrative_criteria: Express Entry contains: Federal Skilled Trades Program, Federal Skilled Worker Program, Canadian Experience Class.

programs.title: Atlantic Immigration Program
programs.summary: For skilled workers and international graduates to work and live in an Atlantic province.

criteria.subject: applicant.work_experience
criteria.value: 1 year work experience in an eligible job or industry

criteria.subject: applicant.education_exception
criteria.value: Work experience requirement may not apply if applicant studied in an Atlantic province

criteria.subject: applicant.job_offer
criteria.value: job offer in a participating community

criteria.subject: applicant.education_credential
criteria.value: qualifying secondary or post-secondary credential

programs.title: Provincial Nominee Program
programs.summary: For workers nominated by a province or territory to support their economy.

criteria.subject: applicant.nomination
criteria.value: nomination from a Canadian province or territory

criteria.subject: applicant.provincial_requirements
criteria.value: meet work experience and education requirements for the nominating province/territory

criteria.subject: applicant.express_entry_eligibility
criteria.value: eligible for one of the programs managed through Express Entry (to use EE-linked PNP)

narrative_criteria: Applicants can also apply through Express Entry if eligible for an Express Entry program.

programs.title: Quebec selected skilled workers
programs.summary: For Quebec Selection Certificate holders who want to work as a skilled worker in Quebec.

criteria.subject: applicant.document
criteria.value: Quebec Selection Certificate (CSQ/QSC)

programs.title: Quebec entrepreneurs and investors
programs.summary: For entrepreneurs and investors who want to work in Quebec.

criteria.subject: applicant.document
criteria.value: Quebec Selection Certificate (CSQ/QSC)

criteria.subject: applicant.financial_capacity
criteria.value: enough money to settle in Canada

programs.title: Francophone Community Immigration Pilot
programs.summary: For skilled French-speaking workers to live and work in certain smaller Francophone minority communities.

criteria.subject: applicant.work_experience
criteria.value: at least 1 year of qualifying work experience in the last 3 years

criteria.subject: applicant.education_exception
criteria.value: Work experience requirement may not apply if applicant is an eligible post-secondary graduate

criteria.subject: applicant.job_offer
criteria.value: job offer from a designated employer

criteria.subject: applicant.language
criteria.value: French

criteria.subject: applicant.education_credential
criteria.value: qualifying secondary or post-secondary credential

programs.title: Rural Community Immigration Pilot
programs.summary: For skilled workers to live and work in certain smaller communities.

criteria.subject: applicant.work_experience
criteria.value: at least 1 year of qualifying work experience in the last 3 years

criteria.subject: applicant.education_exception
criteria.value: Work experience requirement may not apply if applicant is an eligible post-secondary graduate

criteria.subject: applicant.job_offer
criteria.value: job offer from a designated employer

criteria.subject: applicant.education_credential
criteria.value: qualifying secondary or post-secondary credential

programs.title: Home Care Worker Immigration pilots
programs.summary: For skilled workers who want to work in home child care or home support.

criteria.subject: applicant.job_offer
criteria.value: job offer as a home child care provider OR home support worker in Canada

criteria.subject: applicant.work_experience_or_training
criteria.value: qualifying work experience OR relevant training

criteria.subject: applicant.education_credential
criteria.value: qualifying secondary or post-secondary credential

criteria.subject: applicant.stream_specific_requirements
criteria.value: meet requirements for the stream of interest

programs.title: Permanent residence pathway for Hong Kong residents
programs.summary: For Hong Kong residents in Canada (in-Canada graduates stream referenced in heading).

criteria.subject: applicant.passport
criteria.value: valid eligible passport

criteria.subject: applicant.location
criteria.value: Canada

criteria.subject: applicant.status
criteria.value: valid temporary resident status

criteria.subject: applicant.canadian_work_or_education
criteria.value: qualifying work experience OR education in Canada

programs.title: Work permit
programs.summary: To work temporarily in Canada.

fees.text: Starting from: CAN$155 employer-specific; CAN$255 open work permit

criteria.subject: applicant.intent
criteria.value: work temporarily in Canada

criteria.subject: applicant.permit_type_eligibility
criteria.value: meet requirements for employer-specific OR open work permit

criteria.subject: applicant.financial_capacity
criteria.value: support self and family in Canada and return home after

criteria.subject: applicant.employer
criteria.value: work only for eligible employers

programs.title: International Mobility Program Plus
programs.summary: For Quebec Selection Certificate holders outside Quebec who want an open work permit.

criteria.subject: applicant.intent
criteria.value: settle and work in Quebec

criteria.subject: applicant.document
criteria.value: valid Quebec Selection Certificate (CSQ/QSC)

criteria.subject: applicant.document
criteria.value: letter of invitation from the province of Quebec

programs.title: International Experience Canada
programs.summary: For youth between 18 and 35 who want to work and travel in Canada.

criteria.subject: applicant.age_exception
criteria.value: Some countries/territories have age limit 29 or 30

criteria.subject: applicant.eligibility_path
criteria.value: either from a participating country/territory OR meet requirements of a recognized organization

narrative_criteria: IEC categories mentioned: International Co-op (Internship), Young Professionals, Working Holiday.

programs.title: Study permit
programs.summary: To study in Canada.

processing_times.text: Varies by country (see processing times tool)

criteria.subject: applicant.intent
criteria.value: study in Canada

criteria.subject: applicant.institution
criteria.value: enroll at a designated learning institution (DLI)

criteria.subject: applicant.financial_capacity
criteria.value: pay tuition, support self/family, return home after

programs.title: Visit Canada
programs.summary: To visit as a tourist, family or on business, or to transit through Canada.

criteria.subject: applicant.travel_document
criteria.value: a travel document to visit Canada

criteria.subject: applicant.travel_document_type
criteria.value: Most visitors need a visa OR an electronic travel authorization (eTA)

criteria.subject: applicant.us_citizen_exception
criteria.value: US citizens generally only need a valid passport

programs.title: Post-graduation work permit (PGWP)
programs.summary: For recent college or university graduates who want to work and live in Canada temporarily.

fees.text: PGWP: CAN$255; Restoration of student status: CAN$389.75

criteria.subject: applicant.education.enrollment_status
criteria.value: studied full-time at an eligible DLI

criteria.subject: applicant.education.completion
criteria.value: recently completed program

criteria.subject: applicant.language_exception
criteria.value: Language requirement may not apply if graduated from a flight school

programs.title: Parent and grandparent super visa
programs.summary: To visit children or grandchildren for up to 5 years at a time.

criteria.subject: applicant.relationship
criteria.value: parent OR grandparent of a Canadian citizen or permanent resident

criteria.subject: applicant.invitation_letter
criteria.value: letter from child/grandchild inviting applicant to Canada

criteria.subject: applicant.health_insurance
criteria.value: proof of qualifying health insurance

programs.title: Sponsor your spouse or partner
programs.summary: To sponsor your spouse or partner to come live in Canada.

criteria.subject: sponsor.location
criteria.value: Canada

criteria.subject: sponsor.status
value: Registered under the Canadian Indian Act

criteria.subject: sponsor.financial_capacity
criteria.value: provide for basic needs of sponsored person

criteria.subject: sponsored_person.eligibility
criteria.value: spouse/partner must be eligible to be sponsored

programs.title: Sponsor your child
programs.summary: To sponsor your dependant child to come live in Canada.

criteria.subject: sponsor.location
criteria.value: Canada

criteria.subject: sponsor.status
value: Registered under the Canadian Indian Act

criteria.subject: sponsor.financial_capacity
criteria.value: provide for basic needs of sponsored person

criteria.subject: sponsored_person.eligibility
criteria.value: child must be eligible to be sponsored

programs.title: Sponsor your parents or grandparents
programs.summary: To sponsor your parents or grandparents to come live in Canada.

processing_times.text: Loaded dynamically; varies (Quebec vs outside Quebec)

criteria.subject: sponsor.location
criteria.value: Canada

criteria.subject: sponsor.status
value: Registered under the Canadian Indian Act

criteria.subject: sponsor.financial_capacity
criteria.value: enough money to support sponsored people

criteria.subject: sponsored_person.eligibility
criteria.value: parents/grandparents must be eligible to be sponsored

programs.title: Sponsor your adopted child
programs.summary: To sponsor a child adopted from another country to come live with you in Canada as a permanent resident.

criteria.subject: sponsor.adoption_process
criteria.value: complete adoption through the province/territory/country you live in

criteria.subject: sponsor.sponsorship_requirements
criteria.value: meet requirements to sponsor the adopted child from another country

narrative_criteria: Two steps mentioned: (1) complete adoption; (2) apply to bring child as a permanent resident.

programs.title: Get Canadian citizenship for your adopted child (adult or minor)
programs.summary: For an adopted person born in another country to become a Canadian citizen.

processing_times.text: Part 1 dynamic; Part 2 varies by complexity

criteria.subject: applicant.role
criteria.value: Canadian citizen (adopting parent)

criteria.subject: applicant.adoption_process
criteria.value: completing or completed adoption process through province/territory/country

criteria.subject: applicant.adoption_requirements
criteria.value: meet requirements to adopt a child from abroad

criteria.subject: applicant.choice
criteria.value: NOT sponsoring the adopted child for permanent residence (this path is citizenship route)

narrative_criteria: Two steps described: confirm your Canadian citizenship, then assess adopted child's citizenship.

programs.title: Sponsor your other relatives
programs.summary: To sponsor an eligible relative to come live in Canada.

criteria.subject: sponsor.location
criteria.value: Canada

criteria.subject: sponsor.status
value: Registered under the Canadian Indian Act

criteria.subject: sponsor.financial_capacity
criteria.value: enough money to support the people you want to sponsor

programs.title: Be sponsored as a spouse, partner
programs.summary: To come live in Canada as a spouse/partner under family sponsorship.

criteria.subject: sponsor.location
criteria.value: Canada

criteria.subject: sponsor.eligibility
criteria.value: sponsor must be eligible to sponsor applicant

programs.title: Be sponsored as a child
programs.summary: To come live in Canada as a dependent child under family sponsorship.

criteria.subject: applicant.status
criteria.value: qualify as a dependent child

criteria.subject: applicant.requirements
criteria.value: meet all other requirements to be sponsored as a dependent child

criteria.subject: sponsor.eligibility
criteria.value: parent must be eligible to sponsor applicant

programs.title: Be sponsored as a parent or grandparent
programs.summary: To come live in Canada as a parent or grandparent under family sponsorship.

processing_times.text: Loaded dynamically; varies (Quebec vs outside Quebec)

criteria.subject: applicant.relationship
criteria.value: have a child or grandchild in Canada related by blood or adoption

criteria.subject: sponsor.eligibility
criteria.value: child/grandchild must be eligible to sponsor applicant

programs.title: Be sponsored as a relative
programs.summary: To come live in Canada as an eligible relative under family sponsorship.

criteria.subject: applicant.relative_category
criteria.value: meet requirements to be considered an orphaned sibling/nephew/niece/grandchild OR another eligible relative

criteria.subject: applicant.eligibility
criteria.value: eligible to be sponsored as a relative

criteria.subject: sponsor.eligibility
criteria.value: relative in Canada must be eligible to sponsor applicant

programs.title: Tool disclaimer / non-application
programs.summary: Not a program; included as a meta object so an agent can display correct expectations.

criteria.subject: tool.output
criteria.value: This tool is not an application; it provides general information only.

criteria.subject: decision_making
criteria.value: No immigration decision is made based on questionnaire results; officers decide under IRPA.
